base_description: This circuit consists of 14 nodes and 20 branches. The passive components include 10 resistive element(s). For power supply, the circuit has 5 voltage source(s), 3 current source(s). Additionally, 1 controlled source(s) are present. Measurement setup includes 1 voltage measurement(s). In total, this circuit comprises 19 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Adjust the current supply 2 parameter from 49kA to 5kA.
Update voltage source 3: change its value from 72V to 20V.
